description: React component for a demo Twilio SMS card that allows sending SMS messages directly from the browser, with environment variable configuration and error handling.

methods.name: getEnvFirst
methods.description: Retrieves the first environment variable value from a list of possible names.

methods.name: getTwilioConfig
methods.description: Collects Twilio configuration from environment variables, supporting both current and legacy variable names.

methods.name: isLikelyE164
methods.description: Validates if a phone number string is in E.164 format.

methods.name: parseTwilioError
methods.description: Parses error responses from Twilio API, attempting JSON parsing first, then fallback to text.

methods.name: TwilioSmsDemoCard
methods.description: React functional component that provides a demo interface for sending SMS via Twilio API, with input fields, status messages, and send/reset buttons.
